title: Frame Skipping on High-End PCs

embed.description: We're aware of an issue that causes frame skipping in high-end PCs. This can manifest in a few ways: The screen seems to "shake" back and forth as the camera moves around the map, especi...

body:
Hi, 
I recently bought a PC,
When playing league my fps issues match the thread of 
'Frame skipping on High-End PCs' - I have tried all the listed options provided by riot to fix this with no success,
I love playing league with my friends but I can't play with this bug, my player model is jumping all over the screen and it is unplayable, I want to get back to playing normally and enjoying the game with my friends, I would really appreciate some help from a Rioter
Thanks
Endersoup

replies.body: What worked for me was deinstalling any programs like "f.lux" that change your brightness and/or color settings. Hope that helps.
